page.title: 11The River Brue
page.content: The river Brue is up to 4m deep and 5m wide.It is slow moving and has high banks.They are above the surrounding fields which are used by cows grazing.Hay and silage is made.There is a sewage outfall near Pomparles bridge.A Mill stream was used by Morlands sheepskin factory (now closed).Snow's timber yard and Baily's tannery and sheepskin factory still use it.At Clysts hole a new weir was built to prevent flooding.The river falls by 6m. at this point. The{Insects}we saw were :Wall Brown and Red Admiral Butterflies,many Dragon flies.Birds:Heron,Rook, Blackbird,Magpie,Pigon,gull,Swift {Trees:}Willow,Ash,Blackthorn.{Plants: Cow parsley,Charlock,Elder,Bullrushes ,Poppy,Dog Rose,Ragwort,Buttercup,Red Campion,Water lilly,Horse Daisy Teasel Milk Wort,Tansy,Maiden Pink,Chicory
